sub_topic: Probability of rolling a certain number on a dice
message_1: What is the probability that a fair six-sided dice will roll a number greater than 4?
message_2: The probability that a fair six-sided dice will roll a number greater than 4 is 2/6 or 1/3, since there are two numbers (5 and 6) that are greater than 4 out of the six possible outcomes (1, 2, 3, 4, 5, and 6).
